Description: A wooden comb, broken at one end. The complete end curves reaching the widest point in the middle down which runs a a solid wood strip. The comb tapers to the ends of the teeth; one edge has been cut into 24 widely-spaced teeth; on the other edge are 27 very thin closely-spaced teeth and several more broken.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), NW Bastion Level: unstratified
